title: Additiviy Check Failed
body:
The code told me to report this. I was using a very large dataset that was imbalanced and I used the shap.sample method to make it run quicker. It failed in this error. Please let me know what else you need.


explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(rfc, shap.sample(train,1000), feature_perturbation='interventional')
shap_values = explainer.shap_values(shap.sample(train,1000))
100%|===================| 1998/2000 [15:57<00:00]        
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
AssertionError                            Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-52-750dfe1bef66> in <module>()
      1 explainer = shap.TreeExplainer(rfc, shap.sample(train,1000), feature_perturbation='interventional')
----> 2 shap_values = explainer.shap_values(shap.sample(train,1000))

~/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow_p36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in shap_values(self, X, y, tree_limit, approximate, check_additivity)
    325 
    326         if check_additivity and self.model_output == "margin":
--> 327             self.assert_additivity(out, self.model.predict(X))
    328 
    329         return out

~/anaconda3/envs/tensorflow_p36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in assert_additivity(self, phi, model_output)
    433             for i in range(len(phi)):
    434                 val = self.expected_value[i] + phi[i].sum(-1)
--> 435                 assert np.max(np.abs(val - model_output[:,i]) / (np.abs(val) + 1e-2)) < 1e-2, err_msg
    436         else:
    437             val = self.expected_value + phi.sum(-1)

AssertionError: Additivity check failed in TreeExplainer! Please report this on GitHub.
